alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 03 at 3:36AM EST until December 03 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Georgia, western North Carolina and Upstate South Carolina. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility may change quickly over short distances. Sheltered locations will be particularly affected.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Greenville Mountains; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
